summurazation: This video explains artificial intelligence (AI) as the use of computer systems to perform tasks requiring human intelligence.  AI solves problems humans struggle with, such as decision-making and language translation.  Examples include IBM's Watson, which uses machine learning for accurate predictions, and AI software used for cancer diagnosis, facial emotion recognition, and information retrieval.  Future videos will explore AI and future technologies.

resources.title: Artificial Intelligence in Education - ISTE
resources.more_details: ISTE offers free resources and guides for educators who are interested in learning about how artificial intelligence can empower learners at every level.
